ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.ATasks

Class getQuestionTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,Question>
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.ATasks.getQuestionTask

  • public class getQuestionTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,Question>
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to get a single Question object stored in the elastic search database.

    • Nested Class Summary
